page.title: 09BURTON HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: In Burton the prices ranged from Â£30000-Â£57000. The estate can be split into two parts.In the north properties were built early 1970's and are priced today in the range Â£30000-Â£40000 and were mainly designed for the first time/second time buyer.Typical qulities of these houses are, 100% mortage potential,garage,2 or 3 bedrooms and rateable values in the range Â£140-Â£200. In the south the properties are older and prices range from Â£50000+.Typical qualities are; three or four bedrooms with perhaps 1 or 2 garages and space for extensions.These houses have been modernised with cavity wall insulation and double glazing.The rateable values are in the range of Â£200-Â£400. There is also a small council estate of which many of the houses are now privately owned.
